commit message: Bumping to 1.1.0 version in manifest; fixing small warnings
Adding collection selection to new item from webpage
Bugfixes for collection selection on SEND intent
Adding search functionality using LIKE for limited fields (title, creator)
Rename package to prepare rerelease. This is going to be a real pain.
Adding support files for search functionality

Propagate item key updates, from adding new item via API, through to
attachments, so they aren't orphaned.
Fixes to download handling; still need more refinement
